author: NBCNews.com
title: Dead sea animals wash up on Russia's eastern coast, could be result of pollution
description: Beaches in Russia’s Kamchatka peninsula are littered with dead sea creatures after what environmental activists believe is some kind of ecological disaster. The region’s mayor has hinted that manmade pollution may be to blame.
source.name: NBC News

title: Tallahassee Trap, Part 3

author: NBCNews.com
title: Book donations from across the U.S. after hurricane destroys school library
description: After Hurricane Laura destroyed the school library in Louisiana’s Beauregard Parish, Americans donated nearly 3,000 books to help the children in need.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Coronavirus cases continue to surge across the U.S.
description: As the U.S. approaches 7.5 million coronavirus cases, there are troubling signs in around two dozen states where new infection rates are quickly rising.

title: Joe Biden campaigns in Miami ahead of NBC News town hall
description: A new NBC News/Wall Street Journal poll shows Joe Biden opening a 14-point lead on President Trump nationally, with the election less than a month away. Biden told reporters that he’d listen to scientists about the next debate after President Trump’s Covid-19…

author: NBCNews.com
title: Press Secretary tests positive for Covid as White House outbreak grows
description: In addition to Press Secretary Kayleigh McEnany, former adviser Kellyanne Conway and the president’s debate adviser Chris Christie also tested positive. This comes as one White House official says staffers feel left in the dark about confirmed cases.

title: Trump returns to White House to continue coronavirus treatment
description: President Trump’s physician Dr. Sean Conley, briefed the press Monday, saying Trump “may not be entirely out of the woods yet,” but the team of doctors felt confident in Trump’s progress.

title: What treatments Trump has received for Covid-19
description: President Trump received an experimental antibody cocktail designed to kickstart the body’s defenses, remdesivir which is under emergency FDA approval, and the steroid dexamethasone.

title: Trump removes mask after returning to White House from Walter Reed
description: President Trump arrived back at the White House after spending three days at Walter Reed Medical Center to receive treatment for coronavirus. After arriving the president removed his mask as he watched Marine One depart.
